question:
Countries are becoming more and more similar because people are able to buy the same products anywhere in the world.

Do you think this is a positive or negative development.
text: Some people think that countries are becoming more and more similar because citizens can buy the same products from anywhere in the world. This new trend has a positive impact on urban development.

This development trend can promote technological and cultural exchanges between countries. As the country ’s exports and transportation matures, people can save a lot of time to obtain new product information, so that countries can quickly master more technology and knowledge. Just like the emergence of smartphones, they are used all over the world in an instant, It also makes it easier for us to carry out international exchanges and communications, which proves the importance of product exports, which can make progress in urban development.

On the other hand, although mature trade development can make life easier, it means that traditional culture and characteristics are being unified. As everyone knows, consumers will only choose to buy better or more suitable products, so a serious phenomenon will form in the consumer market. Old products will continue to be eliminated, so the traditional culture and characteristics of a large number of products will be Gradually disappear, this is the negative impact of technical unification.
Overall, this development trend has a positive impact on the country.
